mapper.select: SELECT username, account_name, role_ID FROM profile_table where username = #{username};

SELECT P.username, P.account_name, P.TEL, P.gender, P.affiriation, P.address, G.group_name, P.departOfOrigin, P.role_ID, R.role_name from profile_table as P Join group_table as G ON P.username = G.username LEFT Join role_table as R ON R.role_ID = P.role_ID where G.username = #{username};
